mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counsel(category_id, title, content, customer_name, customer_email, status, creator_id, modifier_id, created_at, modified_at) VALUES(#{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{customerName}, #{customerEmail}, #{status}, #{creatorId}, #{modifierId}, now(), now())

INSERT INTO counsel_history(counsel_id, sequence, category_id, title, content, requestor_email, status, creator_id, created_at) VALUES(#{id}, (SELECT a.seq FROM (SELECT COUNT(counsel_id) + 1 AS seq FROM counsel_history WHERE counsel_id = #{id}) AS a), #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{customerEmail}, #{status}, #{modifierId}, (SELECT modified_at FROM counsel WHERE id = #{id}))
